name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Battle Tendency (in development)
name_original: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Battle Tendency (in development)
description:
The second part of the "JoJo's Bizarre RPG" series. Play as Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, and continue the battle against the evil forces of the stone mask and its creators. Meet new and old faces, battle stronger and even more cruel enemies and discover the backstory of the evil stone mask in an RPG style.

This game is still in development and is expected to release by the end of June. There might be a lot of bugs in this demo version. Be sure to report them! And if you haven't already, check out the first game of the series! Link: https://boisbois2.itch.io/jojos-bizarre-rpg-phantom-blood
